p.d: Alexandra learns the truth and decides to set a trap for Florent, knowing he is seriously wounded. Cornered, Émilie confesses to the role she played in her ex-husband's flight. Having decided to help the police as much as she can, Victoire discovers new photographs and confides in Alexandra. Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2019) Screenplay: Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gall Cast: Julie Gayet (Victoire Delorme), Bruno Debrandt (Florent Malléval), Thomas Jouannet (Samuel Delorme), Marie Dompnier (Marion Malléval), Joyce Bibring (Alexandra), Sylvie Granotier (Anne), Alain Doutey (Pierre), Cyrielle Voguet (Émilie), Anne Décis (Ms Carlier), Lucie Fruttero (Léa), Maxime Delacolonge (Hugo), Max Libert (Mathieu) Genre: detective
